about_the_game:
NOTE: The game is still in development, many more things are yet to be added or shown on the steam page. Updates to the page and a EA release date coming soon.

Cast Ashore is a survival-based exploration game that is set in a remote archipelago in the Pacific Ocean. Explore the vast open world and survive by gathering food and resources.

Collect Resources. Craft. Survive.



You're an aerospace engineer aboard the "Fusion Voyager" headed for Mars when a critical failure compromises the mission. You are the only survivor of the crash. Scavenge resources and food while trying to stay alive. Craft tools and weapons which will help you to explore the archipelago.

Build structures




With plenty of structures to choose from, build your very own home on an island or even on a raft. From the basic palm fronds shelter to a fully established wooden or metal base with everything you need to survive.

Navigate the Open Ocean in Search of Answers




Why has such a well planned and calculated mission to Mars resulted in a catastrophe? How come nobody has come looking for survivors? Search the ocean for answers all across the archipelago.

Explore the Archipelago




Construct a raft from the resources you find and set sail to explore. Improve your raft by building everything you might need to survive on it.

About the Development


Music and sound effects are made by Haakon Davidsen. Join the Cast Ashore discord server to keep up-to-date with any new features or updates about the development.



Warning
This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

name: Cast Ashore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU 2.3GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: X64 Quad Core CPU 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Aboard the Fusion Voyager rocket originally set for Mars, you find yourself in a state of panic as you scramble to save what is left of the mission. Your efforts were unsuccessful and you are now the sole survivor of the crash which left you somewhere in the pacific ocean. Survive. Build. Explore.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
